The following bugs in omniORBpy 2.6 have been fixed. Update from CVS to get the fixes.

Summary: ForwardRequest reference counting (bug number 1)
Date: Mon Jul 4 14:42:03 BST 2005
Reported by: Alexey Bulavitsky
Description: Reference counting error with ForwardRequest in servant activator incarnate.
Summary: Exception state not always cleared (bug number 2)
Date: Mon Jul 18 12:36:46 BST 2005
Description: The Python exception state was not always cleared when converting long integers to smaller types, which meant that weird errors would occur later on in processing.
Summary: Module names clashing with keywords (bug number 3)
Date: Thu Dec 15 12:55:33 GMT 2005
Reported by: David Fugate
Description: References to items in modules with names clashing with keywords were broken.
